quest.name: Imperial Intruders
journal: Unwelcome visitors to the forest have Tonaxia ill at ease.

Frightening “steel ones”─imperial soldiers─are roving the forest, and Tonaxia fears for her people's safety. Furnishing you with makeshift projectile weapons capable of unleashing an obscenely foul odor, she bids you chase off the intruders.
You have seen to the Garlean menace. Assure Tonaxia that the steel ones will bother her people no more.

Tonaxia is profoundly impressed by your strength and selflessness. Shedding a tear for the friends she has already lost to the Garleans and their fearsome weaponry, she is nonetheless heartened to hear that the danger has been quelled for the moment.
objectives: Use morbol bilebombs on the imperial soldiers, and defeat any reinforcementsUse a morbol bilebomb on the final imperial soldier, and defeat any reinforcements.

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: Scary steel ones come to the forest, stomping flowers and snapping trees!

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: The forest is no place for steel ones, but these ones have not the strength to face strong, scary steel ones! Will walking one chase off steel ones?

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: This one can help. This one made stink bombs from bigmouth one's stink-juice. Any nose-having one will run away from the stink, this one is certain.

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: Walking one must throw stink bomb at any steel one walking one sees─but be careful! Strong steel ones may fight back!

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: Walking one must find steel ones, then use stinky-juice stink bomb to drive them from these ones home!

dialogue.name: IMPERIALA
dialogue.text: Seven hells! What is this stench!?

dialogue.name: IMPERIALC
dialogue.text: Did a morbol just empty its innards? I feel ill...

dialogue.name: IMPERIALD
dialogue.text: Hah, I drank swill worse than this last night! You'll not escape alive!

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: Steel ones are gone from forest? This one is beside oneself in gratitude!

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: Steel one brought giant, spiky one? This one has lost many friends to those ones. This one is frightened.

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: This one is fortunate to have strong friend like walking one. Promise this one that strong one will stay and keep these ones safe.

dialogue.name: POP
dialogue.text: The imperial soldier has summoned a magitek vanguard!
